direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve operations related to sub-account deposits, handling similar parameters and return types.
Both methods access and manipulate sub-account assets, though they perform different operations.
Both methods handle similar types of exceptions related to sub-account operations, such as invalid parameters or network issues.
Both methods depend on the RequestHandler for sending signed requests, sharing a common dependency.
Both methods have similar structures involving parameter checking and sending signed requests to the Binance API.
